content: ties are worked as i-cords then stitches are increased for ear flaps ear flaps are worked flat separately then stitches are cast on joining ear flaps to body of hat body of hat is worked in the round follow either chart or written directions for pattern stitch finished measurements approximately 19 21 / 48 5 53 5 cm around x 8 / 20 5 cm high not including earflaps shown in 21 / 53 5 cm size berroco wizard 262yrds/240m 3 5oz/100g 1 ball #2933 apatite 16 / 40 cm circular needle size 8 / 5 mm 1 set double-pointed needles size 8 / 5 mm 2 double-pointed needles size 7 / 4 5 mm gauge 19 sts and 26 rnds = 4 / 10 cm in st st and pattern stitch on larger needle
